    • Method Detail

      • setInternalTriggerPeriodMicros

        public int setInternalTriggerPeriodMicros(int microseconds)
        Set the period of the internal trigger generator (specified in microseconds).
        Parameters:
        microseconds - time period to set
        Returns:
        If successful, we return the value specified by the "microseconds" parameter. If an error occurred (IOException), we return -1.

      • getInternalTriggerPeriodMicros

        public int getInternalTriggerPeriodMicros()
        Get the last configured internal trigger period.
        Returns:
        the internal trigger period (in microseconds), or -1 if this setting is unknown.

      • getInternalTriggerPeriodMinimum

        public int getInternalTriggerPeriodMinimum()
        Get the minimum allowed value for the internal trigger period in units of microseconds.
        Returns:
        min. period.

      • getInternalTriggerPeriodMaximum

        public int getInternalTriggerPeriodMaximum()
        Get the maximum allowed value for the internal trigger period in units of microseconds.
        Returns:
        max. trigger period.

      • getInternalTriggerPeriodIncrement

        public int getInternalTriggerPeriodIncrement()
        Get the step size for the internal trigger period in units of microseconds.
        Returns:
        trigger period increment.

      • setTriggerSource

        public int setTriggerSource(int triggerSourceCode)
        Sets the trigger source.
        Parameters:
        triggerSourceCode - Allowed values:
        0 = external
        1 = logic zero
        2 = logic one
        3 = internal
        Returns:
        0 if successful, -1 if error occurred (invalid triggerSource or IOException)

      • getTriggerSource

        public int getTriggerSource()
        Gets the trigger source.

        The following codes are valid:
        0 = external
        1 = logic zero
        2 = logic one
        3 = internal

        Returns:
        0 if successful, -1 if error occurred (invalid triggerSource or IOException)
